A careless admin reused a nonce when signing two confidential messages with ECDSA. Recover the private key from the signatures below: Sig1: c050c3f0b8d45b9e093a91cb96d097b24100e66585d0d8561e01c1231837493fa205dd218ba9e1819627ee6af1ea0596b2989fb2370390b27319ea1493e00f9c

2. Second signed message
Curve: secp256k1The flag format is flag{hex(private_key)}
